p: Contrived urine samples were generated by spiking whole viral particles into 100 μL of freshly collected negative urine or water. Five μL of the Extraction Process Control (EPC) was then added to the sample prior to conversion. The EPC consists of intact MS2 phage and is added to the sample to control for proper sample conversion, reverse transcription and to monitor any PCR inhibition. Samples were then converted using the EasyScreen Sample Processing Kit, SP001 (Genetic Signatures, Sydney, Australia) according to the manufacturer’s instructions.
